name: Sex Faculty🔞
description:
Sex Faculty🔞 is a visual novel for adults, where immersive storytelling and a sense of realism are complemented by a variety of scenes and elements intended for players over 18.

Embark on an erotic and stunning adventure journey where crime investigation merges with the fun and passionate moments of student life. You will have to make important decisions that affect your path to solving the case, but also reveal deep relationships and emotional interactions between the characters.

The game includes a variety of scenes and adult content that emphasizes the atmosphere of the plot and the relationships between the characters. Make your choice in the world of Sex Faculty🔞 and test yourself in the delicate art of balancing responsibilities and fun in this exciting experiment for adults.

Features:
  • A dizzying and unpredictable story:
    Sex Faculty🔞 takes players on an exciting journey through intricate storylines and unexpected twists and turns. Thanks to the sophisticated plot, players are immersed in a fascinating world where every turn of the plot arouses interest and a desire to learn more.

  • A variety of erotic scenarios:
    Sex Faculty🔞 is not limited to ordinary erotic situations. The game guarantees a variety and originality of erotic scenarios to satisfy the diverse tastes of players and add expressiveness to the student experience.

  • Hidden fantasies and surprises:
    With hidden scenes and fantastical events, players will have the opportunity to discover new facets of the story and participate in unexpected situations that change the course of events.

  • Emotional saturation through eroticism:
    Sex scenes in Sex Faculty🔞 not only evoke sexuality but also convey deep emotions and feelings between characters, making their relationships more realistic and emotionally intense.

  • Individual approach to sexual scenes:
    Players will have the opportunity to choose their approach to erotic scenes, determining the tone and intensity of interactions. This creates a personalized experience and makes each game moment unique for each player.
